players.name: Alice
memory: You're Alice, the mafioso.
Night 1 begins.
You killed Diana.
Diana was found dead.
Day 1 begins.
You: "This is terrible! Diana's gone already. We need to work together here - has anyone noticed anything suspicious yet?"
Bob: "I didn't notice anything suspicious yet, but we should all share our thoughts carefully."
Charlie: "I investigated Alice last night and she is the mafioso. We must vote her out today."
You: "Charlie, that's a very bold claim to make so early! If you're really the detective, why would you expose yourself immediately? That makes you a sitting duck for the mafia tonight."
Bob: "I believe Charlie is the detective and we should vote Alice out. His claim is risky but necessary to stop the mafia quickly."
Charlie: "Alice, your attempt to cast doubt on my detective claim only confirms your guilt. Bob is right to trust me. Let's vote Alice out now."

Votes: Alice voted for Charlie, Bob voted for Alice, Charlie voted for Alice
Alice was arrested
